original_title: Carol Burnett: 90 Years of Laughter + Love
overview: Paying tribute to a beloved national icon for her birthday, NBC celebrates Carol Burnettâ€™s illustrious career with a star-studded event featuring an A-list lineup of musical performances and special guests who come together to share their love for one of the most cherished comediennes in television history.
tagline: So glad we had this time together.
title: Carol Burnett: 90 Years of Laughter + Love
